Name: Claroty
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The [Claroty](https://claroty.com/) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables ingestion ofâ€¯ [Continuous Threat Detection](https://claroty.com/resources/datasheets/continuous-threat-detection) and [Secure Remote Access](https://claroty.com/industrial-cybersecurity/sra) events into Microsoft Sentinel.

1. **Claroty via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting Claroty logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**.

2. **Claroty via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting Claroty logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

**NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of Claroty via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
